pp1.7:5.2: Sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hoti, ummujjitvā nimujjati, ummujjitvā ṭhito hoti, ummujjitvā vipassati viloketi, ummujjitvā patarati, ummujjitvā patigādhappatto hoti, ummujjitvā tiṇṇo hoti pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo. #1
pp1.7:6.1: Ubhatobhāgavimutto, paññāvimutto, kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto, dhammānusārī, saddhānusārī. #2
